de.amr.plt.rcParkingRobot
Interface IAndroidHmi

All Known Implementing Classes:
AndroidHmiPLT
public interface IAndroidHmi

Human Machine Interface module for communication with NXT robot. The device implementing this interface is acting as the client, the robot HMI module is supposed to be the server. The client receives data like position, speed, and available parking slots. Nevertheless it can send commands to change mode and selected parking spot as well.

Author:
PLT

Nested Class Summary
static class IAndroidHmi.ParkingSlot
          ParkingSlot re-implementation for Android.
static class IAndroidHmi.Position
          Contains all information about robot position and movement.

Method Detail

getCurrentStatus

parkingRobot.hsamr0.GuidanceAT.CurrentStatus getCurrentStatus()
Returns CurrentStatus which is one of (DRIVING,PARKING,INACTIVE,EXIT).

Returns:
the robot's CurrentStatus

getNoOfParkingSlots

int getNoOfParkingSlots()
Returns number of detected parking slots (value changes during "Scout" mode).

Returns:
total number of parking slots so far.

getParkingSlot

IAndroidHmi.ParkingSlot getParkingSlot(int id)
Returns a ParkingSlot with the given ID. This contains further information like start position, end position and parking slot status.

Parameters:
id - identification number of requested parking slot
Returns:
the ParkingSlot matching the provided ID

getPosition

IAndroidHmi.Position getPosition()
Returns bundled current X and Y location , heading angle phi, robot speed and distance to other objects in all 4 directions.

Returns:
next Position from position message queue.

setMode

void setMode(parkingRobot.INxtHmi.Mode mode)
Changes the robot's driving mode. Possible values are SCOUT, PARK_NOW, PARK_THIS and PAUSE.

Parameters:
mode - request driving mode for robot

setSelectedParkingSlot

void setSelectedParkingSlot(int id)
Selects a parking slot via id. When parking mode is active, this parking slot will be approached.

Parameters:
id - ID of selected parking slot
